DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : BENTON OIL FIRM EXPECTS $ 1.1-MILLION OPERATING LOSS
DOC.TEXT: Benton Oil and Gas Co . said it expects to report an operating loss for 1993 of about $ 1.1 million . The Oxnard energy concern also said it will cut its capital spending on its Siberian project because of a $ 5.50-per-barrel Russian export tax.Benton spent a total of $ 10.2 million to develop the Siberian oil field in 1993 . This year , it plans to spend about $ 2 million . The company said it is discussing with the Russian government a possible lifting of the tax . In addition , Benton said it will drill six exploratory wells in the Gulf Coast region of southern Louisiana . While highly speculative , Benton said , if successful the wells could double the company ' s current production of 5 # 500 barrels of oil a day .
